author: A_Brickset_user
title: Brickster
review:
Why doesn't he have a backpack? Anyways, the parts are good for making a new criminal for a lego town of yours. Like, remove the head, and replace it. I will admit, the brickster's head is a little bit ugly. Bye.

-Captain Scottman13.

author: AddictedToStyrene
title: Minfig
review:
Came with a Chupa Chups lollipop in a sealed plastic egg. The only way to tell what figure you got was to break the seal - hopefully you bought it first. They started at $6 Australian, but after a couple of months stores were letting trays of eggs go for a few dollars.

This set had one figure and no other pieces of Lego.

I don't know about other people's experiences but I found this figure to be very common. I may have to build a prison in my Lego town.
